param.label: Number of blank samples
param.help: Specifies the number of blanks included in the data set

param.label: Number of individuals per group
param.help: A comma-separated vector (e.g. 3,2) indicating the number of individual samples in each group

validator.message: Enter a comma-separated list of positive integers (e.g., 3,2)

param.label: Number of runs
param.help: Specifies the number of times that the function should run the decontamination procedure on the data.

param.label: Regression
param.help: Specifies the regression equation used to calculate the constant. 0 = it chooses between regression 1 and regression 2 based on the lower threshold and upper threshold arguments. 1 = it always uses regression 1. 2 = it always uses regression 2

param.label: Lower threshold
param.help: Selects the lower point for switching between regression 1 and regression 2. It is usually best not to change this value

param.label: Upper threshold
param.help: Selects the higher point for switching between regression 1 and regression 2. It is usually best not to change this value

param.label: Zero proportion threshold
param.help: This is the threshold at which if that proportion of 0s are present for an OTU within a group, all samples will be set to 0 for that OTU for that group

param.label: Proportional threshold
param.help: This is the threshold at which if the number of reads for a particular OTU are below this proportion, the OTU will be set to zero for all individuals in that group
